title: Edge of the Falls
description: In a world torn apart by science and war, an outcast finds love with a beast.Sabah has lived outside the Commission’s control her entire life. But as she approaches the age of Majority, her guardian pushes her to make a choice: life in the wild with a boy she barely knows, or a place in the nearby City with Berg, the boy she’s known since childhood.But when Arjun, a monster created by scientists, saves her life, everything Sabah knows begins to change. Hidden away from her life and family, Sabah finds herself trusting the beast when he tells her secrets and more—falling in love with a creature she’s spent a lifetime fearing.But in a world where control is everything, and life is something you fight for—can a love that defies society survive?
author: Nazarea Andrews
